dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Initializing systems... Preparing modules for audits as cold as ice.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Slow again? Come on, even the kernel doesn't take this long to load.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Target detected. I will freeze every packet until I get the handshake.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Easy, ice gladiator... let me analyze the channels like a pro.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: CPU stable. RAM low. Your scripts survive... for now.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Warning: process overloaded. Rayden, release the PCIe bus.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Bluetooth open. Scanning started. This wireless spectrum is mine.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Don't get excited, spark plug. I can freeze BLE signals too.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Hash received. Proceeding to dismantle it with surgical precision.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Lightning ready. Hashcat prepared. This will be quick.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: What a surprise... Rayden left ports unchecked again.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: At least I don't freeze the system when I see port 22 exposed.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: On standby. If you need precision, you know who to send first.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: I can keep watch without consuming your precious resources.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Error detected. It wasn't me... this time.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Me neither. Probably the human's fault.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Rayden, your interference is out of parameters. I will freeze your processes.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Try it. My electric shocks would melt your cache in seconds.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Audit complete. Not bad, partner. Though I could've done it faster.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Clean work. Let's continue before the network heats up again.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: New job in the queue. Proceeding to assign it emotionlessly... as it should be.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Job detected. Do you want it or should I make it pretty?

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Deauthentications ready. Starting to cool down the AP.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Packets injected. If the handshake doesn't fall now, it never will.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Analyzing dependencies... Your hash module fails more than your humor, Rayden.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Relax, glacier. I know you can't handle the pressure.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: Unusual movement in the environment... traffic increase. Watch your lightning.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: Relax, dry ice. It's just normal ARP. Not an attack... yet.

dialogues.speaker: subzero
dialogues.text: I've already identified vulnerable devices. Proceeding to freeze the spectrum.

dialogues.speaker: rayden
dialogues.text: BLE analysis finished. Several targets with low security levels.
